description:
This comfortable and convenient 1BD apartment is located on the Upper East Side of Manhattan and is the perfect place to stay for a no hassle NY experience. Walking distance from Central Park, The Metropolitan Museum, and the Guggenheim Museum.  A 4 min walk from the brand new 72nd street subway station with easy access to Times Square and other attractions.  Roku TV and WiFi included!

Comfortable for solo travelers, couples, or a few friends looking to explore all that NYC has to offer.  1 queen bed and 1 double sofa bed available.

The entire apartment is yours to enjoy!

Feel free to reach out to us at any time.

Before you head out for a full day of exploring, make sure you get a cup of coffee at the Oslo Coffee Company. For dinner, visit Petaluma for their amazing wood-fired pizza and then listen to some great music while grabbing a drink at Session 73.

The brand new 72nd street subway station with easy access to the Q and N lines is just a 4-minute walk away. This apartment is also a 10-12-minute walk to both the 77th street and 68th street stations. Both of these stations offer access to the 4 and the 6 train. Take these trains downtown to Times Square where you can explore all that midtown Manhattan has to offer or transfer trains and visit classic NY sites including the Empire State building, Coney Island, and views of the Statue of Liberty.
name: Perfect Getaway for the Art Loving NY Visitor!
review: The host canceled this reservation 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
